short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that displays YouTube comments and live chat as an overlay above the video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch YouTube videos like never before! YouTube Comments Chat v1.1.2 now brings the interactive chat experience to both regular videos and live streams.

🆕 What's New in v1.1.2:
• Live Chat Overlay for Live Streams: Experience live chats in a whole new way with our overlay feature, now available on YouTube's live stream pages!

🥳 Key Features of YouTube Comments Chat v1.1.2:

🔥 Real-time Comments and Live Chat Display:
Turn static comments into a live chat overlay that appears above regular videos, and now enjoy the same seamless experience with live streams.

💬 Seamless Integration:
YouTube Comments Chat v1.1.2 syncs effortlessly with both regular YouTube videos and live streams, allowing you to see comments as they roll in without interrupting your viewing.

🔧 Customizable Settings:
Adjust the appearance of the comment display to suit your viewing style, whether you're watching a regular video or a live stream.

🎉 Easy to Use:
Simply add the extension, open any YouTube video or live stream, and watch as the comments appear in the overlay. No complex setup required!

🌟 Quick Start:
1️⃣ Install the extension with one click.
2️⃣ Open any YouTube video or live stream.
3️⃣ See the comments displayed in the overlay above the video or live chat messages displayed on the stream page.
4️⃣ Customize the chat overlay to your preferences.

💯 Ready to Enhance Your YouTube Experience?
Install YouTube Comments Chat v1.1.2 now and enjoy an interactive chat experience for both regular videos and live streams!

🔄 Update from v1.1.1:
If you're updating from the previous version, please refresh your browser after installation to activate the new live stream overlay feature.
